courses.advice_detail_en: A bit chilly but good for running. Light layering works well. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Some snow or meltwater on the surface may cause slipperiness. Trail running shoes or shoes with good grip are recommended. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
